data.text: @hkfp Isn’t that obvious. Why even think of stopping crowded MTR’s , Buses and Mini Buses !?!?!
@A2AD14 @hkfp Totally, you get people who could have safely stay home now exposed on the day of testing and of course their tests won't come out +ve on that day.
@hkfp Really stupid idea of mass testing. People who could have safely stayed at home now have to spend hours on the streets, with +ve rate in population around 20%
@hkfp Are the people who operate public transport exempted from the mass testing? And people in the financial services?
@hkfp Data data data data data incoming
@hkfp The testing haven’t any useful In HongKong
@hkfp What’s wrong with Hong Kong Government.. Burning money with testing yet no logistics or aftercare .  Creaming the coffers of Taxpayers funds with “associates contracts“ .
@hkfp is there really going to be a lockdown?? when will the pandemic in Hong Kong end💆🏻‍♀️💆🏻‍♀️
